description:
The seasons pass, and all the girls are about to advance to the next grade in school. Perhaps they`ve grown a bit more mature? At Rize`s suggestion, they all go out for afternoon tea at a nice café to celebrate. The next day, for some reason, Cocoa seems to be giving more effort than usual...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cocoa-senpai no Yuuga na Ochakai Tutorial
ココア先輩の優雅なお茶会チュートリアル
